name: 余政杰
objective:
Course Outline for Electromagnetics:
1. Vectors and Fields
2. Electrostatic Field and Electric Energy
3. Electric Currents
4. Magnetostatic Field and Magnetic Energy
5. Time-Varying Electromagnetic Fields
Course Outline for Electromagnetic Waves:
1. Uniform Plane Electromagnetic Waves
2. Reflection and Transmission of Plane Waves
3. Transmission Lines
4. Waveguides and Cavity Resonators
5. Antennas
